title: Defense Attorney

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, select a player. You will defend them from the burden of living by fucking killing them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - As a practitioner of all things defense related, you will ignore the defense of any player you visit, whether innate or granted by an ability or attribute.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Defend all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 1922
*Don't worry about the legal fees.*
